item.description:
A good GPS address to use is: 35 County Rd. North Falmouth, MA. Which is the bike shop nearby. The biking parking lot is next to the RR tracks on County Rd. Extra parking is available at the library.

Directions: 495 S becomes Rte. 25 E

After Bourne Bridge, enter rotary 2nd exit Rte. 28 S [4 mi.]

Next rotary off on 1st. exit Rte. 28 A [short]

Left to stay on Rte. 28 A [3 mi.]

Right turn on to County Rd. [Short]

After RxR tracks, right turn into biking parking lot.

 

Now for the Grub part: Feel free to join the group for a bite at the Lobster Pot:

Rt. 6 & 28
3155 Cranberry Highway
Buzzards Bay - Wareham Line
Cape Cod, Massachusetts
508-759-3876

 

If rain is in the forecast, I will cancel the night before the ride.
item.name: Ride the Shining Sea Bikeway
